response.original_title: Disturbing Father & Family Annihilator Chad Doerman | Sick & Evil or Mentally Ill
response.overview: Days after a judge agreed to throw out his confession to murdering his sons, Chad Doerman has formally pleaded not guilty because of insanity. Doerman was arrested on June 15, 2023, after allegedly shooting and killing his three young sons outside of their Ohio home.
response.title: Disturbing Father & Family Annihilator Chad Doerman | Sick & Evil or Mentally Ill
